## sfeir_cli check-dns

Resolve DNS for a host

```
sfeir_cli check-dns [flags]
```

### Examples

```
# sfeir_cli check-dns google.com
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for check-dns
      --host string   Focus the host
```
